docs.text: BlockWiki A wiki for Block-Stacking game developers. Here you will be able to see a lot of infos you could need in order to build your own Block-Stacking game, especially the infos you can't find on the Harddrop wiki . The wiki is made for collaboration, so do not hesitate to add your knowledge in it (just make a pull request on the Github repo ). The wiki is currently almost empty. Please take some time to create wiki pages, it will help a lot ;).
